summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2051, for the improvement of West 64th Street, from 17th Avenue Northwest to 20th Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, by regarding, curbing and reconstructing concrete sidewalks, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20563 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
